name: curriculum
description: By Weng Fei Fung. Working on making my coding snippets and guides sharable and contributable between a separate repository here and my Gamified Knowledge app at https://github.com/Siphon880gh/gamified-knowledge. Cooking up.

scripts.commit:
git add -A; FILENAMES=`git diff --cached --name-only | while read -r file; do basename "$file"; done | tr '
' ','` && git commit -m "New - $FILENAMES";
scripts.old-commit(shows full path):
git add -A; FILENAMES=`git diff --cached --name-only | tr '
' ';'` && git commit -m "New - $FILENAMES";
scripts.deploy: npm run commit; npm run push && npm run browserMac;
